dmca.title: [ABUSE] www.citydatingdirect.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

We are in receipt of you letter dated January 26, 2006. The disputed
material in the above-referenced letter is the domain name, not the content
of the website. As an ISP, we are compelled by Federal Law to disable access
of website if it infringes copyright or trademark rights of third parties.
This is not the case since the website www.citydatingdirect.com neither uses
the Trademark Dating Direct on its website nor has  Dating Direct content
display there. As the disputed material is the domain name and it is not
under our control, because it was not registered with us. This issue should
be resolved either by the registrar of the domain name citydatingdirect.com
or ICANN.

Legal Response Team
ThePlanet.com

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 27, 2006 7:59 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] www.citydatingdirect.com

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Thursday, January 26,
2006 at
10:57:18 AM and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to
your team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] www.citydatingdirect.com

MESSAGE BODY:
ThePlanet.com Internet Services Inc

1333 North Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas

TX

75207

US

 

Dear Sirs

 

www.citydatingdirect.com (?the Website?)

 

We act for DatingDirect.com Limited (?our Client?) of The Axis, Holliday
Street, Birmingham B1 1TF.

 

Our client has been trading under the names ?Dating Direct? and
?DatingDirect.com? via a website at that domain since January 1999. It
offers a respectable online dating agency service for singles seeking
serious friendships and relationships. Our client is a major player in
online dating and currently has over 2.5 million members. Our client spent
almost
